about_short_description.short_description: Statera Energy is a company that generates, transmissions, and distributes electric energy.

product.name: Battery Storage
product.description: Battery storage systems provide short-duration energy storage, supplying electricity to the grid for periods of up to four hours.

product.name: Flexible Generation
product.description: Flexible generation plants use gas-fired reciprocating engines to provide electricity to the grid, covering shortfalls in renewable generation and responding to demand surges.

product.name: Hydrogen Production
product.description: Green hydrogen is produced via electrolysis powered by renewable energy, stored, and used to run low carbon flexible thermal generation plants.

product.name: Pumped Hydro
product.description: Pumped hydro-electric storage offers medium-duration energy storage by using excess electricity to pump water to a higher elevation, which can then be released to generate electricity when needed.

product.name: Wholesale Power Markets
product.description: The primary market for trading electricity between generators and suppliers, targeting short-term trading to balance the system.

product.name: Frequency Response
product.description: Services used by National Grid to maintain response and reserve capacity to manage frequency and cope with unexpected losses.
